title: Gatsot: Crowdsourced Price Comparison App
description: Gatsot is a crowdsourced price comparison app that uses receipt image processing to display product prices from various markets, ranked by cost. It features a loyalty system for users who contribute data.

title: PopTracker: Indoor Population Tracker App
description: PopTracker is a mobile app using Arduino-connected motion sensors to monitor and display real-time data on indoor population flow. Sensor data is sent to a cloud server for app visualization.

title: FQPlugins: Unturned Rocketmod Plugin Collection
description: FQPlugins is an open-source collection of essential plugins for the game Unturned. It caters to the Unturned community by providing highly sought-after functionalities through Rocketmod plugins.

title: Leo4 Domain Validator
description: Leo4 is a microservice built to validate domains and verify ownership. It ensures that the domains registered by customers are truly owned by them, providing a simple and secure verification process.
